entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as a person whose life is being discussed. The text states 'the boy Riddle' and later 'the man Voldemort', indicating that he is the main subject of discussion.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who is listening to Dumbledore's story. He nods in response to Dumbledore's question.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the one sharing his memories and asking for Harry's opinion. He is described as someone who has been trying to find evidence about Voldemort's life.

relationships.description: Dumbledore has information about Voldemort, which he shares with Harry. He mentions that it was difficult to find evidence about the boy Riddle and even harder to find anyone who could give a full account of Voldemort's life.
